title: Application
description: A schema for the application definition.

name.description: Specifies the name of the application.

environment.description: Specifies the environment name of the application.

tags.description: Specifies the tags that should be applied to Azure resources.

identity.description: Specifies the identity section of the application.

admin_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the admin group.

developer_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the contributor group.

reader_group_name.description: Specifies the name of the reader group.

service_principal_name.description: Specifies the name of the service principal.

network.description: Specifies the network section of the application.

private_endpoint_subnet.description: Specifies the private endpoint subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.

databricks_private_subnet.description: Specifies the databricks private subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.

databricks_public_subnet.description: Specifies the databricks public subnet config for the application.

cidr_range.description: Specifies the cidr range of the subnet.
